enum_field_with_not_applicable.title: Enum field with not applicable option
enum_field_with_not_applicable.description: An enum field with the allowNotApplicable and (the optional) notApplicableLabel option set in the UI Schema

enum_field_override.title: Enum field with overridden options
enum_field_override.description: An enum field with overridden options. Note that the enum values are still validated against the original enum values. This implies that the overridden options must be a subset of the original options.

enum_field_with_labels.title: Enum field with labels
enum_field_with_labels.description: An enum field with labels defined in the UI Schema using 'options.enumLabels'.

enum_field_with_default.title: Enum field with default value
enum_field_with_default.description: An enum field with a default value

enum_field_readonly.title: Enum field in readonly mode (defined in the UI Schema)
enum_field_readonly.description: An enum field with a default value in readonly mode (defined in the UI Schema)

oneof_enum.title: Enum field with a oneOf construct
oneof_enum.description: An enum field with a oneOf construct

enum_booleans.title: Enum of booleans
enum_booleans.description: Boolean enum via oneOf with titles

enum_radio_horizontal.title: Enum as radios (horizontal)
enum_radio_horizontal.description: Radio buttons laid out horizontally, also using a custom notApplicableLabel

enum_selectbutton_required.title: Enum as selectbutton (required)
enum_selectbutton_required.description: Render as required SelectButton. Note that when the property is required, there is no not applicable option.
